name: Somnath Banerjee 0001
content: Somnath Banerjee Somnath Banerjee Candidates interested in pursuing a PhD, drop an email to firstname.lastname@ut.ee with the subject line SocialNLP:PhD Home Research Outreach Contact Reach me Email: firstname.lastname@ut.ee Office Address: Delta Centre, Narva mnt 18, room 3063, 51009 Tartu, Estonia Profiles Google Scholar dblp Linkedin About Me My name is Somnath Banerjee. I am currently working as a Lecturer (aka. Assistant Professor) at Institute of Computer Science, University of Tartu, Estonia. The University of Tartu ranks in the top 1% of the world's best universities. I did my Ph.D. in Engineering at Jadavpur University, India. I also earned Master’s degree in Computer Science & Engineering at Jadavpur University, India. I am interested in the field of Artificial Intelligence, particularly Natural language processing. Past Associations Post-doctoral researcher, University Milano-Bicocca, Italy Post-doctoral researcher, LIMSI, French National Centre for Scientific Research (CNRS), France Intern, Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV), Spain Research Engineer, Jadavpur University, India Guest Faculty, Jadavpur University, India Presently, I live in Tartu. It is the second-largest city in Estonia and will be the European Capital of Culture in 2024. Tartu @Night © 2022 Somnath Banerjee
